summary: Frontend testing completed for UI audit: URL Redirects, Custom Scripts, and Product Editor template tags. All pages display correctly with light mode styling. Template tags are BLUE and CLICKABLE with copy icons.
critical_code_review_comments: TemplateTag component properly implemented with blue styling (bg-blue-50, text-blue-700, border-blue-200)
All template tags are clickable buttons with copy-to-clipboard functionality
Light mode styling correctly applied to URL Redirects and Custom Scripts pages
CopyTag component uses proper light mode colors (text-blue-700 on light backgrounds)

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All visual and functional tests passed
